name: European Diisocyanate and Polyol Producers Association
membership:
ISOPA is an affilated association of CEFIC ( European Chemical Industry Council).
ISOPA is member in the Deutscher Wirtschaftsrat
memberOrga: The members of ISOPA are BASF, Covestro,  BorsodChem, DOW Europe, Hunstman Polyurethanes, SHELL
goal:
ISOPA is the European trade association for producers of diisocyanates and polyols - the main building blocks of polyurethanes.

* ISOPA promotes the highest standards of best practice in the distribution and use of diisocyanates and polyols

* ISOPA ensures that all stakeholders can easily access accurate and up-to-date information on diisocyanates and polyols

* ISOPA shows how polyurethanes help fulfil society's present and future needs
interests: Consumer Affairs, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: REACH, Circular Economy, Energy Efficiency, Waste
